page.title: 081st RETIREMENT TO PULHAM
page.content: After 30 yrs in the army Wilfrid & I moved to Pulham North Green 8yrs ago, looking for fresh air & space to enjoy our animals.We run a boarding kennels & cattery,& occasionally breed & show our own dogs,we keep other animals & enjoy the countryside on horseback.We prefer home grown food & at various times have kept a cow,calves,pigs poultry,& grow fruit & vegetables & preserve them;we use hedge row fruits for jam & wine.We have settled happily to our new way of life,working long hours outdoors in all weathers & our neighbours have helped us to become absorbed in the local community.On 2nd retirement,(not just yet)we hope to explore our new county & all East Anglia & have just purchased a boat to use on the Broads.
